import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import HistoryAPI from "../../API/HistoryAPI"; import Image from "../../Share/img/Image"; function DetailHistory(props) { const { id } = useParams(); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const [information, setInformation] = useState({}); const [openPay, setOpenPay] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await HistoryAPI.getDetail(id); setCart(response.products); console.log(response); setInformation(response); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
